    "name": "A01",
    "id": null,
    "parentId": "{{RoomID}}",
    "category": "rack",
    "description": [
        "Rack A01",
        "The original one",
        "-3/-5\\nA0-Z9"
    ],
    "domain": "DEMO",
    "attributes": {
        "posXY": "{\"x\":10.0,\"y\":0.0}",
        "posXYUnit": "tile",
        "posXYU": "tile",
        "size": "{\"x\":60.0,\"y\":120.0}",

        "posZUnit": "cm",
        "posZU": "cm",
        "height": "42",
        "heightUnit": "U",
        "heightU": "U",
        "template": "Some template",
        "orientation": "front",
        "vendor": "someVendor",
        "type": "someType",
        "model": "someModel",
        "serial": "someSerial"
    }
}
